thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 36 of 7211
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: I purchased several items from B&H (Asus Laptop, Canon Printer and MacBook Pro). They were always able to get me the lowest price, even when the price listed on their website had increased from the day before. Although there was a slight glitch with of the purchases, all of the sales reps I spoke with were polite and helpful and in the end, they were able to fix the issue quickly and without any hassle. Not to mention that their prices are extremely competitive! Will definitely continue to use B&H for all my future electronic needs.
